000: The park from the bridge crossing the railway. From all buildings only a few remain today as the park of the blastfurnaces of Uckange.
001: Below the blastfurnaces. We did not expect a thing at first, but soon the touristic fences did ring some bells. Also the weeds were not as high as in normal abandoned buildings.
010: The last picture a german wagon for transporting liquid metal. The lights ruin the picture. We leave now, people are coming our way.
002: As we noticed the video surveillance we decided to go, after making the following pictures.
005: The information signs and fences for the tourists can be see on this picture.
008: Here it is even more clear.
009: The rails for loading the wagons are still there. Even the wagons are still in place....
